title: Bug 18285 - Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: Doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: Doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the package view outline. 2. Doubleclick on a type import statement.
